DIET-RANGE.D_breakfast: Breakfast : a cup of oatmeal with half of an apple and a teaspoon of cinnamon and a cup of unsweetened coffee
DIET-RANGE.D_lunch: Lunch : one scrambled egg and a slice of low-fat cheddar cheese on whole-wheat toast
DIET-RANGE.D_dinner: Dinner : half of a cooked chicken breast, a big portion of vegetable salad (lettuce, cherry tomatoes, bell pepper, red onion, lemon juice) and a cup of unsweetened herbal tea

DIET-RANGE.D_breakfast: Breakfast : a cup of low-fat or non-fat yogurt with half of a cup of berries and a cup of unsweetened green tea
DIET-RANGE.D_snack1: Snack : a cup of sliced fruits(optional)
DIET-RANGE.D_lunch: Lunch : one wholemeal roll willed with half of a cup of tuna and a cup of vegetable salad (lettuce, red sweet pepper, spring onions)
DIET-RANGE.D_snack2: Snack : a cup of sliced fruits
DIET-RANGE.D_dinner: Dinner : a half of a baked medium-sized fish, half of a cup of roasted sweet potatoes, a cup of steamed broccoli and cauliflower and a cup of unsweetened herbal tea

DIET-RANGE.D_breakfast: Breakfast : 2 boiled egg whites, a cup of vegetable mix (cucumber, lettuce, cherry tomatoes) and a glass of freshly squeezed orange juice
DIET-RANGE.D_snack1: Snack : a cup of yogurt with nuts and berries(optional)
DIET-RANGE.D_lunch: Lunch : two cups of vegetable soup and a slice of whole-wheat bread
DIET-RANGE.D_snack2: Snack : a cup of yogurt with nuts and berries
DIET-RANGE.D_dinner: Dinner  : a cup of chicken and rice stir-fry, half of a cup of peas and a cup of unsweetened herbal tea
